creator: vpeddapalli@nascopgh.com
text:
Giving a comment in table to comment a row throws error on the command line 
with the message string"--" is not permited in the comments

creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text:
Well, two consecutive dashes are not allowed within an XML comment. This is
a restriction of XML, see the XML spec for details and rationales.
batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
